txt.en: This fragment, found upon the grodbog-queen, appears to have been sundered in twain. It is possible that this item can be fused with another like item.\n\nYou should find the second half of the object and show them to Gelirwen at the Shadowed Refuge.
'It is as I thought, this is a ward used to seal a doorway. If there are such doorways within Skûmfil, it is possible that this item was used to allow passage.'

'The item you brought me appears to be some type of key or ward, but it is sundered. I cannot be certain until you have both pieces. Return to me when you have recovered the second piece of the item.'
A stinking ward found, sundered, upon the corpse of the leader of Skûmfil could be a means to enter the depths of the area plagued by kergrim and insects.
Bring the fragments to Gelirwen at the Shadowed Refuge
Gelirwen is at the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nYou discovered an item on the grodbog-queen in Skûmfil. It is possible that another half of the item rests on the other combatant at the location.
